plot: In the year 1982, an elite interstellar fighting force was abandoned in deep space due to corporate downsizing. Trapped in orbit around the mysterious meat planet of Haggis One.
title: Pork Fist Punch!
plot_es: In the year 1982, an elite interstellar fighting force was abandoned in deep space due to corporate downsizing. Trapped in orbit around the mysterious meat planet of Haggis One.
plot_en: In the year 1982, an elite interstellar fighting force was abandoned in deep space due to corporate downsizing. Trapped in orbit around the mysterious meat planet of Haggis One.
